strIntroduction:
Classic Taichung night tour including Feng Chia night market, maple garden, Taichung Metropolitan Opera House and more!

Get ready for a awesome night out in Taichung city!
strTitle: Classic Taichung Night Tourï¼ˆPick up service and English guide includedï¼‰

strIntroduction: Come and have a thrill jeep ride as you conquer the bumpy sand dunes at Aberdeen Desert in Manjhou, Kenting! This activity is led by a group of professional instructors who will drive with you for a thrilling ride on large wheels jeep as you whip across the perilous sand dunes. This is as thrilling as a roller coaster ride where you would be driven up a five story high sand dune, the descent is a sharp 75 degrees drop, the instructors will control the speed of the jeep according to the age of the passengers, so adults and children can both enjoy this thriller.
strTitle: Jeep riding adventure at Manjhou Kenting

strIntroduction: Realize your highest dreams when you paraglide in Hualien. Enjoy a birdâ€™s eye view of the entire East Rift Valley, as you soar into the sky and take in the beautiful skyline.
strTitle: ã€Flying high in Hualienã€‘Fantastic Paragliding Experience in Hualien

strIntroduction: The coolest thing you could do this summer is nothing but carrying an oxygen tank and diving into the colorful sea world of Green Island to discover all the magnificent and beautiful corals, fish, and shells that you've never seen. Apart from vast sea and blue sky, Green Island also has three world-class diving sites - Shih-lang, Chai-kou, and Dabaisha, and they will definitely leave you unforgettable memories once you come to see it by yourself.
strTitle: Green Island Discover Diving 3-Days Package Tour

strIntroduction: Lying on the luxurious green grassland with the gently brush of wind on your face, enjoy the view of Cing Jin Veterans Farm that was built like a European chateau with herds of sheep grazing and strolling lazily on the pasture, while looking at the overlapping moutain ranges and white clouds, chase and run around with the little sheep and don't forget to take pictures of this beautiful scenary and action, this is one of the most relaxing tour that you would definitely enjoy.
strTitle: Cingjing Farm one-day Trip (Depart from Taichung)

strIntroduction: Alishan cannot be reached by trains. Is taking public transportation the only way? KKday offers you a new option - shared-shuttle service. It's super convenient! Seats are limited daily. Buy it now!
strTitle: Shuttle service between Chiayi Fenqihu to Alishan

strIntroduction: Go sea scuba diving! Our professional instructors will scuba dive with you to explore the sea bottom, forget all your worries and enjoy this relaxing and wonderful moment as you are surrounded by the ocean.
strTitle: Boat scuba diving at Houbihu, Kenting (Free shuttle service)

strIntroduction: This brand new created Monster Village will take you on an illusive journey as though you have walked into the traditional land of Japan, this village built in Japanese style , the monsters are not scary at all, but cute and adorable, it is a fun place for adults and children.
strTitle: Nantou Monster Village Xitou one-day tour

strIntroduction: It's a must to enjoy a dip in the world-class salt-water hot spring if you come to Green Island. The outdoor Zhaori Hot Spring is the perfect spot for watching the sunrise in Green Island. Let's enjoy the hot spring while watching the sun rises from the sea level afar, and savor this wonderful moment together! . . The package includes ferry tickets, accommodation, and motorcycles as transportation vehicles, ensuring you an easy breezy 3 days 2 nights trip in Green Island.
strTitle: Green Island Jhaorih hot spring 3-Days Package Tour

strIntroduction: The only way to experience the oceanic lifestyle is to take a ferry ride to Orchid Island! If you are lucky, you might be able to see flying fish, dolphins while you on board of the ferry to the beautiful Orchid Island.
strTitle: Orchid Island Ferry Ticket (Departing from Houbihu Kenting or Fugang Taitung)

strIntroduction: New shuttles routes limited daily. It's a new way of traveling, allowing you to go anywhere you want! After seeing sunrise in the morning, you will be at Sun Moon Lake in the afternoon.
strTitle: Shuttle service between Alishan to Sun moon lake

strIntroduction: Hualien Taroko is the work of Mother Nature. The impressive ravine has been through ten million years of wind and water erosion. Walk on the Taroko trail, you will see the Eternal Spring Shrine, which is a Chinese style architecture, and the spectacular scene of numerous small caves appearing on the walls called The Swallow Grotto. This 30-minute trail is the essence of Taroko. When visiting Taroko, be sure to spend a day or half a day to enjoy the majestic scenery.
strTitle: Huailen Taroko Gorge half day tour

strIntroduction: Apart from enjoying a hearty seafood feast, you can go skin diving too! You can experience all sorts of exciting and thrilling water activities. Kenting is definitely a spot where you should keep in mind! Spend an entire afternoon feasting on seafood and playing water activity in Houbihu. . .
strTitle: Skin Diving at Houbihu Kenting and Water activity of your choice

strIntroduction: What is river trekking? A magical combination of hiking swimming and rock climbing. Be sure to try it out on this trip to Hualien!
strTitle: ã€The King of Riverã€‘The Adventure of River trekking in Hualien

strIntroduction: Enjoy two islands in one trip! Explore the paradise-like scenery in Orchid Island and Green Island in this 3 day 2 night trip, including a night visit to the owls in Orchid Island, an experience to the rare Zhaori Salt-Water Hot Spring, and a chance to scuba dive into the beautiful sea world of Green Island. The package comes with ferry tickets, rent motorcycles as transportation vehicles, and accommodation for you to enjoy the magnificent islands of eastern Taiwan easily and trouble-free.
strTitle: 3 Days 2 Nights Trip in Orchid Island and Green Island

strIntroduction: This is one of the trendiest water activities in Europe and America for the last three years, Hollywood superstar â€“ Leonardo Dicaprio, international singer Rihanna are SUP players. SUP enables surfer to stand on board and paddling hand over hand, it is a highly safe activity and you can surf with ease whether you are on a river, lake or at sea as if you are walking on water.
strTitle: Kenting South Bay tidal force SUP paddles

strIntroduction: Visiting Orchid Island is like visiting an exotic foreign country. The locals still follow the old customs and way of life. They even keep a local calendar. The Orchid Island 4 Day and 3 Night Excursion will allow you to soak in the local culture of Orchid Island as you circumnavigate the island on a motor scooter, becoming immersed in the island and its natural beauty. This trip covers all your needs, from transportation, to lodging and special tours. It will surely be an unforgettable journey.
strTitle: 4 days 3 nights package tour in Orchid island

strIntroduction: Summer is the perfect time to visit eastern Taiwan. Come to Green Island, 50 minute away from Taitung, to see the clear and blue ocean, go for a nocturnal visit to find the wild Formosa Sika Deers, and enjoy an experience of world-famous salt-water hot spring. Moreover, you could ride bicycles through the field roads in Taitung, watching people paragliding in Luyah Gaotai, and in summer time, you could even see hot air balloons slowly rising up to the sky. A relaxing trip to eastern Taiwan is a must in the summer.
strTitle: 3 Day Package Deal including Scuba Diving in Green Island, and Chartered tour in Taitung

strIntroduction: Alishan House is a top-class hotel with newly constructed exquisite suites on Taiwan's highest scenic spot. Staying in the Alishan House lets you feels at home, and brings you unforgettable memories.
strTitle: 2-day Alishan tour, staying at Alishan House

strIntroduction: Nowadays, barbecue is not a cuisine but a culture. It has even become an eating lifestyle in many countries. For decades, barbecue as an entertainment event has bonded families and friends in the most traditional way. Children rarely experience, fun catching shrimp in wild brook!
strTitle: ã€Hulien Night lifeã€‘River shrimping plus star light BBQ
èŠ±è“®è¼•èˆªæ©Ÿé«”é©—

strIntroduction: Want to travel to the outlying islands - Orchid Island and Green Island - in one time? Now you do not have to return to Fugang Fish Port in Taitung to do so. The recently launched ferry itinerary, limited for summer time from May to September, allows you to enjoy the two islands with only one ferry ticket. Without the limitation of using the ticket at the same day, you can choose to stay more days in Orchid Island or Green Island, and hop on the ferry according to ferry schedule. You can experience the totally different atmospheres on both islands with just one ticket.
strTitle: Ferry tickets for 3 days to travel around Taitung, Orchid Island and Green Island

strIntroduction: If you only have half a day in Taitung you can still have a great time! Visit the Waterfront Forest's International Landmark and art installations. Take a bike ride through Forest Park, then visit the musical enclave of Ironworks Village. These are Taitung's can't miss attractions.
strTitle: Half-Day Tour around Taitung's International landmark, Waterfront Park and Ironworks Village

strIntroduction: Taiwan is surrounded by the sea and there isn't a more beautiful coastline than on the east coast. No matter if your taking a local road through that vast expanse, coming from the south, passing through Taimali back to Taitung, or whether you are taking route 11 to Taitung, the east coast is brimming with a beautiful blue azure and incredible scenery, which changes with each passing season. If you don't want to spend too much on transportation, select the ride share trip. Have fun while you ride. A long distance road trip is a journey all its own.
strTitle: Along the coast : Hualien Kenting day tour (daily departure)
Theme Tour of Ocean Park (One-day tour)

strIntroduction: Due to Orchid Island's unique climate and environment (high temperatures and lots of rain and typhoons) as well as as it's reliance on its own resources, a unique dwelling has sprung from these factors "The Underground House." Upon arrival at Orchid Island a visit to The Underground House must be accompanied by either a professional tour guide or by a host. One cannot just go into The Underground House to take a peek or take pictures. If you want to experience this unique cultural landmark have a professional take you there to explore.
strTitle: 3 days 2 nights package tour in Orchid island

strIntroduction: Apart from common shore diving, you could also enjoy the relatively rare offshore deep sea diving to see more colorful fish and even Green Island's unique sea creature - pygmy seahorses. The wonderful view will definitely impress you.
strTitle: Offshore deep sea diving in Green Island (PADI certificate required)

strIntroduction: Coming to the beautiful eastern Taiwan, you can consider to stay in Green Island for scuba diving and exploring the magnificent sea world, as well as going on a night visit to find Formosa Sika Deers; and stay another day in the pure land of Taitung to go for an adventurous rafting experience in Xiuguluan River. This trip offers you a complete package to travel in Green Island and Taitung, with planned itinerary, transportation and accommodation all being taken care of, so you could take in the beauty of nature in eastern Taiwan.
strTitle: 3-day package trip including scuba diving in Green Island and rafting in Xiuguluan River in Taitung

strIntroduction: Departing from Taitung along route 9, riding north along the valleys, you will hit many scenic spots such as: Loyeh, Brown Avenue, Paradise Road. Along the way, take in the scenic valleys of lush green rice paddies. Ride your bicycle leisurely through the S-shaped country roads. Travel simply in Taitung for maximum relaxation.
strTitle: 1-day tour around Taitung's East Rift Valley

strIntroduction: At Orchid Island, the bottom of the ocean is not just blue â€” itâ€™s in color! Divers are treated to great visibility at Orchid Island; you can see up to 50 meters when conditions are good. The water offers great photographic conditions, even better than those in many other vacation island spots. When you visit Orchid Island, donâ€™t miss the chance of diving in Taiwanâ€™s best and clearest sea!
strTitle: ã€Underwater Discoveryã€‘Discover Diving Experience on Orchid Island

strIntroduction: Don't just get your feet wet on Orchid Island for 3 days, soak in the beautiful blue sea and scenery , from head to toe. From the mountains to the sea Orchid island is home to some of the most picturesque views imaginable. Snorkel in the clear waters and bath in the cold springs! Have the unique experience of breaking through waves on a traditional Tatara Canoe.
strTitle: 3-day package tour at Orchid island and Taitung

strIntroduction: First time in Taipei? Three things you need to do while youâ€™re here: visit Yehliu GeoPark's Queen's Head Rock, light up a sky lantern in Pingxi, and sample the famous taro snacks at Jiufen Old Street while enjoying the splendid views. Get to all three of these must-visit attractions around Taipei in one day! You don't even have to worry about how to get around â€” just sit back and enjoy Taipei!

strIntroduction: Before going into the water to snorkel you should be completely relaxed, leaving all of your worries on the land. Just let your eyes take in the beautiful ocean scenery. Under the guidance of an expert snorkeler, you will be able to appreciate nature's divine creations. In the tranquil sea the multitude of colorful coral and schools of beautiful fish will surround you. You may even be able to approach and take a photo with a 100-year-old tortoise!
strTitle: ã€Underwater Discoveryã€‘Discover Diving Experience on Green Island

strIntroduction: Letâ€™s show you the real Taipei on bikes!
strTitle: ã€Taipei Night Bike Tourã€‘Awesome adventure night tour

strIntroduction: Blue Ocean House Vacation Village is right next to the beach and is home to your host, an extremely experienced snorkeler. Whether you want a relaxing snorkeling experience along the coast or to go into deeper waters to snorkel, this trip provides both. There's no need to waste time and effort on arrangement for this outing, just let down your hair and relax on this trip.
strTitle: Snorkeling at Orchid Island's Blue Ocean House

strIntroduction: Enjoy Orchid Island and Green Island at one time! During this 4 days 3 nights trip, you can cool off the steamy summer hotness by dipping in the ocean, enjoying water activities and scuba diving in Orchid Island, as well as experiencing the rare Zhaori salt-water hot spring in Green Island. All the complicated planning has already been taken care of, including ferry tickets, accommodation, and transportation. Just take your adventurous heart and let's go!
strTitle: 4 Days 3 Nights Island Jumping Trip across Orchid Island and Green Island

strIntroduction: Orchid Island is considered the lost pearl of the Pacific, as such, a visit to orchid Island is not only a chance to bathe in the beautiful nature and scenery, but is also like taking a trip to an exotic land, where the local culture thrives. This two day, one night snorkeling trip package will save you the hassle of booking boats, accommodations and motorbike times, allowing you the leisure to chat and go about your business.
strTitle: 2 Days 1 Night package tour in Orchid island
